overview: Sabash Sariyana Potti is a laugh riot acts by Jayaram & directs by popular small screen actor Venu Arvind. The film is about the problems faced by an extremely popular actor, who wants to enter politics, and everything is told in a hilarious way. “The movie is a complete laughathon”, Sriranjani plays the heroine while music is by Thaman.
title: Sabash Sariyana Potti
